author: Flash Gordon
title: Sand sculpture museum
text: # 1 The sand sculpture museum in Mysore is a unique museum. A very good intuitive as this offers something different to tourists than the usual museum artifacts. All sculptures are made form just sand and water. It is quite a feat to ensure these structures don't fall apart like the ones we see in the beaches. Located on the base of chamundi hills, it is a small museum but worth 20-30 minutes visit. There is an entrance fee of Rs 40. For more details, check http://www.greatholidayideas.net/wee...m,-mysore.html Attached Images
